/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a corridor of urban life. Cars and pedestrians animate the scene, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The predominant colors in the image are gray and green, reflecting the urban environment and the natural elements within it.
